channel.title: Dividend Increase on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Dividend Increase on FinanClub

item.title: AZN
item.description: score:-39 Chances: AstraZeneca plans to raise its annual dividend by 7% for 2024, showing potential for increased shareholder returns. Enhertu, co-developed by AstraZeneca, has been approved by the FDA for treating metastatic HER2+ solid tumors, indicating potential for revenue growth. AstraZeneca’s strong Buy rating and technological edge in biopharmaceuticals position it as an investable stock with impressive growth prospects.
